name.description: The name of the releasable composition

parentPathFromBase.description: The path to the parent, measured from the base. If the base is the parent, you can enter an empty string

pathToBase.description: The path from the releasable module to the base of the project. The base is the directory that contains all modules

earPathFromBase.description: The path to the releasable module from the base of the project. The base is the directory that contains all modules

dependenciesSorted.description: A sorted list with all dependencies. The plugin uses the ordering of this list to traverse the modules

groupId.description: The Maven groupId for this dependency

artifactId.description: The Maven artifactId for this dependency

pathFromBase.description: The path from the base directory to this dependency

subModuleOf.description: If this dependency is part of a module (parent pom with modules that are released together), specify the releasable parent here

groupId.description: The Maven groupId for this dependency

artifactId.description: The Maven artifactId for this dependency
